title: Dmitry Kostomarov
summary: Dmitry Pavlovich Kostomarov (Russian: Дмитрий Павлович Костомаров; March 23, 1929 – August 9, 2014) was a Soviet and Russian mathematician, academician[1] of the Russian Academy of Sciences, dean of the Faculty of Computational Mathematics and Cybernetics at Moscow State University (1990—1999), Professor, Dr.Sc.[2]
